attributes.long-description:
Death Track: Resurrection introduces high speed vehicular chaos as players travel to a future in which the world has been plunged into chaos. Traditional sports have been replaced by the far more aggressive and violent types of entertainment. The main event of the year, Survival Racing, is a world tournament that takes place in the largest cities across the globe. Powerful vehicles and spectacular road battles are performed by world-renown and feared drivers as they compete for glory and huge cash prizes. Players can enter this world alone or with a friend using split-screen and battle deadly AI’s, or join a game with 8 other drivers to really crank up the mayhem.

Main features:
- 10 unique futuristic vehicles,
- Multiple vehicle upgrades;
- Upgradeable weapons;
- 10 post-apocalyptic city tracks: New York, Paris, Bangkok, London, Vatican, Prague, Moscow, Istanbul, Tokyo and San Diego;
- Easily recognizable locations with well known landmarks.

Copyright by SkyFallen ©, 2010. Copyright by Gaijin Entertainment ©, 2010.
Death Track is registered trademark of 1C Company.
Online Interactions Not Rated By The ESRB.
